current_task: Improved Apple Music import - use heavy rotation instead of alphabetical
message: Major improvement to Apple Music import! Now fetches most-played artists instead of alphabetical library order. Uses /v1/me/history/heavy-rotation and /v1/me/recent/played APIs with weighted scoring. Please deploy with full rebuild.

action_required.why: New heavy rotation import code needs fresh build. Previous alphabetical import was not useful.

files: src/components/apple-music-auth.tsx - Updated import logic to use curated top artists
changes.behavior_change: Apple Music import now fetches 30 most-played artists by frequency, not 10 alphabetical library artists
